TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UrlParameterReader extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader

summary.span: 读取使用 HTTP 实现的 Web 服务的传入请求参数，参数的名称/值对编码到 URL 请求字符串中，而不是编码为 SOAP 消息。

span.span: Reads incoming request parameters for Web services implemented using HTTP with name-value pairs encoded in the URL's query string rather than as a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和中的其他类命名空间支持通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的 Web 服务的.NET Framework 的实现。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服务编写器和读卡器序列化和反序列化，分别的参数或返回对象的 Web 方法的 HTTP 请求或响应流之间。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服务编写器和读卡器使用 HTTP 传输，但不交换使用 SOAP 标准的消息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 类提供的服务端方法， ，而读取参数名称/值对的编码为 HTTP 请求 URL 的查询字符串。The class provides a service-side method, , to read parameter name/value pairs that are encoded into an HTTP request URL's query string. 例如，在 URL 中`http://contoso.com?a=1&b=2`，`a`和`b`是参数名称和`1`和`2`是它们的值。For example, in the URL `http://contoso.com?a=1&b=2`, `a` and `b` are parameter names, and `1` and `2` are their values. 你通常不需要使用直接。You typically will not need to use directly. ASP.NET 配置文件时的 (Web.config) 启用 HTTP GET Web 服务`protocols`元素包含`add`元素其名称特性的值是"`HttpGet`"。HTTP-GET Web services are enabled when an ASP.NET configuration file's (Web.config) `protocols` element contains an `add` element whose name attribute's value is "`HttpGet`". 启用一个 HTTP GET Web 服务和收到适用的 HTTP 请求时，会自动使用类。The class is automatically used when an HTTP-GET Web service is enabled and an applicable HTTP request is received.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object[] Read(class System.Web.HttpRequest request) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read (request As HttpRequest) As Object()

param.name: request
param.span: 一个 对象，该对象包含 HTML URL 编码的名称/值对。

span.span: A objectcontaining HTML URL-encoded name/value pairs.

summary.span: 将编码到 HTTP 请求的查询字符串中的名称/值对读取为 Web 方法参数值。

span.span: Reads name/value pairs encoded in the query string of an HTTP request into Web method parameter values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用的内容对象的属性。The method uses the content of the object's property.
